column1: Kata Robata////Appetizers: Boyfriend and I ordered the grilled squid and the kakuni pork belly. The grilled squid tasted like any other grilled squid I've ever had but I wasn't expecting anything different. The Kakuni was delicious though. Yummy
column4: and spinach. This was the BEST part of the meal hands down. Would come back only so I could order this ten times over.
